籤詩版本二:
Mvura inotonhora uye muto unofashaira usina kupisa, usingatonhore kana kupisa asi unodziya
Kusaita chimwe chinhu munyika, kuve nesimba mumhando dzose dzehunyanzvi
詩意:
Hexagram iyi chiratidzo chekushandisa zvakanaka zvinhu.
Zvose zvakagadzikana uye zvakanaka.
解曰: Vasungwa vanoregererwa. Chirwere chinosangana nachiremba akanaka. Tsvaka pfuma netariro. Noble instructions.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lintong Kununura
Late Sui Dynasty. Mambo Li Yuan weTang Dynasty akapfuura nepamuti achidyara gomo mujinga meGomo reLintong.Pakarepo, varume vakasimba vasingaverengeki vakamhanya vachibuda musango, vachivhara nzira nemapfumo marefu nematemo, vachida kuvauraya. Li Yuan akange akakomberedzwa uye zvaive zvakakosha.
Panguva iyi Shubao akange ave kuda kukotsira muTembere yeWuyuan.Akashamisika paakangoerekana anzwa ruzha rwevarume nemabhiza vachishevedzera kufa kunze kwetemberi. Akabva angokwira bhiza rake ndokumhanya akananga pakati pegomo, mujinga megomo maiva nehutsi nehuruva pose painzwika mhere mhere.
Nekumhanya kwemheni Shu Bao akabva apinda ndokuuraya vanhu vakawanda vakatevedzana.Vavengi vakatiza mativi ese.
Akaponesa mhuri yaLi Yuan. Ndiko kuti, akashandiswa zvakare namambo weTang Dynasty. Akave gamba rekutanga reTang Dynasty.
聖意: Musha wemhuri unozviitira zvakanaka, kutsvaka pfuma, uye kutengeserana ndiko kuroora.Varume vanofamba netsoka muLiujia vanosvika mumunda, makonye anokura, mombe nhanhatu dzinobudirira, kutsvaka vanhu, mhosva inopararira, kutama kunofadza, pfuma yakarasika inowanikwa, chirwere chakachengeteka, gomo neguva zvinofadza.
